messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] un-birthday cakes
messages.msgSnippet: ... A Very Merry Un-Birthday, to you, to you..... My cub scout den wanted to have a party next month, but they re all at the valentines is GROSSSSS stage, so
messages.messageBody:
1/28/03 17:27:

> I do bake pretty regularly, but not often cakes. The other night I made a
> chocolate cake with peanut butter icing, and both girls came running out
> asking who's birthday it was. I told them nobodies. They said it had to
> be somebodies or I wouldn't be making a cake. So we put candles on the
> cake and sang Happy Birthday to Mr. Nobody! It was fun.

A Very Merry Un-Birthday, to you, to you.....

My cub scout den wanted to have a party next month, but they're all at the
valentines is GROSSSSS stage, so we've having an un-birthday party! Should
be fun. Can you believe several of these kids (mostly 7 yr olds) had never
heard of an un-birthday?

brenda
